get.description: Get role for a user on a particular project. Returns self role if no userName is set.

404.description: Requested user or project doesn't exist or the user doesn't have enough permissions (i.e. project is hidden from the current user)

post.description: Set role for a user on a particular project

403.description: User doesn't have permissions to manage this members

404.description: Requested user or project doesn't exist
Requested user or organization doesn't exist.
